_Tip: We recommend using Z Palette's Spatula to help de-pot your pans from your branded Palettes to any Z Palette. _

iWhite Teeth Whitening Kit whitens teeth by up to 7 shades for a brighter, healthier smile.
Designed for instant, professional results in the comfort of your own home, iWhite Teeth Whitening Kit is an innovative one step system which actively removes stains and strengthens your teeth whilst delivering a natural whitening effect.
Featuring a new, revolutionary whitening gel which has been clinically proven to be safe and instantly effective, iWhite Teeth Whitening Kit is easy to wear and effortless to use. The product is composed of 10 thin and flexible trays to ensure a comfortable fit and maximum performance. No need to clean or boil mouthpieces, mess with syringes or brushes, measure gel or use special toothpastes or rinses. The individually packaged single use whitening trays are one size fits all and designed for optimal convenience and hygiene. This at home treatment should be worn 20 minutes a day during 5 consecutive days for an amazingly brighter smile that is up to 7 shades whiter.
iWhite Teeth Whitening Kit is based on a unique Film-Crystallised Calcium Technology which provides an instant whitening effect, actively removes stains and remineralises the teeth simultaneously. The white crystals used in combination with strong film forming Polymeric Agents will physically fix the crystals on the targeted tooth surface which will lead to an optical whitening effect.
This high performance teeth whitening kit also contains Phthalimido Peroxycaproic Acid (PAP), this unique patented ingredient targets and dissolves the unnatural double bounds which cause the dental discoloration without affecting the dental structure.
The whitening trays are manufactured with soft transparent material to improve the flexibility of the mouthpiece. The pressure gradient, which is one of the most important catalysing parameters of the whitening reaction is optimised and pushes the active gel on the teeth surface for maximum whitening results. The tray is designed to whiten both the front and the back of the teeth which is important because teeth are translucent and stains on the back can show through the front.
iWhite Teeth Whitening Kit leaves the teeth looking visibly whiter and brighter for a healthier smile whilst the teeth are strengthened with stains and discolouration effectively eliminated.

Fusing white, pink, taupe and gold, the colourful magnetic palette holds individual pans of your favourite products. Use the magnetic stickers provided if your own pans don't stick for the ultimate customisation.
product_name: Exclusive Glitter Hi-Gloss Medium Magnetic Palette

product_description:
A false lash set that promises to deliver a fluttery finish.
Designed with an array of clusters varying in density and length, the Lyla 3D Mink Band-Less Lashes are sure to create a one off look. Each of the weightless mink fibres has been attached to an invisible band so you can create a bold finish without being over the top.

A set of lightweight falsies that aim to focus lengthened drama on the outer corner for a sultry finish.
Designed with high quality mink hair attached in clusters varying in both density and length, the Mink Lashes Rainbow Wings are perfect for beginners and lash-addicts alike. Predominantly focusing the length towards the outer corner of the durable band, these lashes offer a super-subtle yet incredibly beautiful finish to your favourite looks.

A revolutionary tanning mitt designed to tan your whole body, including your back, with ease.
Finally, the solution to our tanning troubles has arrived. Bronzie's Got Your Back Tanning Mitt is a 3-in-1 self-tan applicator mitt, which features two tanning mitts attached to a middle section, all made with luxurious, thick velour. Use the two mitt ends simultaneously to halve your tanning time - lined with a protective film, they'll keep palms dry and tan free, whilst the plush fabric will buff tan into skin for a super natural finish. The middle section allows you to blend your fake tan all over your back area effortlessly - no more stretching, straining or twisting to achieve an all over glow!
With elasticated panels, the Got Your Back Tanning Mitt stretches to reach every part of your body. Washable and reusable, too, this is set to be your new must have tanning accessory.

A large sized customisable palette.
Glitter Hi-Gloss Large Magnetic Palette is an empty palette designed to organise and carry your favourite products. Inside the oil-and-water brushstroke casing, magnetically attach individual pans of eyeshadow, lipstick and powder and take it with you as you travel.

Drying eye shadow brushes and keeping their perfected shape used to be difficult until now.
Innovatively designed to remove all moisture from your freshly washed brushes as well as keeping their desired shape, Sigma Dry'N Shape Tower Eyes hold up to forty eight shadow brushes at once.  Clipped upside down into the perfectly sized spaces and shape holding band, the tower is truly a utensil you'll never want to be without.

A pair of flared eyelashes.
With a clear band, attach Mink Crystal Lashes Estrellita to the lash line for seamless volume. In small, compact sections, the thick base and feathered ends create subtle length and volume with maximum definition.

A pack of four henna sheets.
Hand drawn, Sundara Metallic Tattoo Collection is an exclusive collaboration created by Darcy Vasudev of Henna Lounge. With a two-toned metallic finish, simply apply to the hands, feet and body for a beautifully delicate and sophisticated look.

Add some drama to even the simplest of eye looks with these voluminously fluffy lashes.
Carefully crafted with fine fibres of synthetic silk, the 3D Silk Lashes Dragoness offer comfortable, lightweight wear. The ultra-long, softly curled lashes are attached to a durable black band, so you can rock an eye-catching finish time and time again.

A 4 in 1 blending sponge.
Concealing and covering, Nanshy's Marvel Blender creates a buildable, airbrushed base. With a fine tip, flat sides and rounded bottom, use the ergonomic sponge for complete control in all the hard to reach areas of the face.

What could be better than a customisable palette with a built-in mirror?
Holding up to sixteen of your favourite hues for the face and eyes, the Mirror Magnetic Palette is perfect for those on the go travelling beauties. Boasting a secure magnetic base to keep hold of your pans along with a pull out mirror, this perfect, travel-friendly companion is an essential for beautifying on the move.
Wispy 4 Day Premium Lashes adds definition to the lash line without weighing-down the eyelids. These synthetic lashes create a fuller finish that remains perfect for up to four wears.

Morphe Brushes ZMB6 Organizer Set Bag is a dual layered cosmetics case with a wipe clean design.
Sleek, stylish and entirely practical, ZMB6 Organizer Set Bag is a makeup artist's saviour for organised storage and effortless transportation of your makeup collection. With two exterior zipped pockets and an adjustable shoulder strap, ZMB6 Organizer Set Bag can also be used at home to keep your makeup neat and tidy.

A sculpted beauty sponge crafted to seamlessly blend your favourite complexion perfecting mediums.
This innovative lightweight Flawless Beauty Sponge harbours a unique shape carefully cut to blend liquids and powders on all areas of the face including those hardest to reach. Used damp to ensure a skin-mimicking, airbrushed finish with little product absorption, this sponge will truly become the only tool you need to create a flawless base.

A deep brush cleaner.
Cleaning and disinfecting, Brush & Sponge Cleaner removes dirt, bacteria, oils and product build up. Suitable for all brush and sponge types, use regularly to reduce breakouts and irritations whilst refreshing with a light, delicate scent.

A makeup blending sponge.
With a flat edge, My Flawless Blender Edge applies and blends makeup seamlessly. The super soft, latex free sponge blends cream and powder products perfectly in and around the contours of the face.

The Lash Guard works to protect your perfected eye look from mascara mishaps. Ergonomically designed the Lash Guard sits perfectly behind the lashes to allow for application of mascara without a worry.

Anna Sui Beauty Tray is a gorgeous storage box for your makeup essentials.
Beautifully adorned with a butterfly motif and antique inspired detailing, Beauty Tray is the perfect way to organise your dressing table. Fill with makeup, accessories, brushes and beauty tools to keep your beauty area neat, tidy and organised.

A large statement cosmetic bag.
With a detachable wrist strap, Slay The Night Large Wristlet Makeup Bag stores all your makeup essentials with ease. Designed with a faux leather finish, wipe clean and keep secure with a silver zip fastening.
product_name: Slay The Night Large Wristlet Makeup Bag

product_description:
Paul & Joe Cosmetic Pouch IV Horses is a fun and stylish storage solution for all your makeup essentials.
Combining great looks and fantastic functionality, Cosmetic Pouch IV Horses is a soft vanity case which is your ideal makeup travel companion and has room for even more items and additional carrying convenience.
The top section has slim compartments for storing brushes and pencils, along with a hygienic storage flap. In the vanity section, there is a small pocket on the side where you can store your Paul & Joe cosmetics in an easy and practical way. The zip fastening ensures all your makeup is kept safe and secure during transit.
The frolicking horse print is selected from a Paul & Joe Fashion original print and allows you to indulge your sense of adventure and wonder. Just carrying this chic pouch is so exciting you'll instinctively want to show it off.

Large empty magnetic eyeshadow palette.
Keep all of your colours at the tips of your fingers with Morphe's ACC4 Empty Magnetic Palette. Holding up to forty singular eyeshadows, it's the perfect mess free, accessible storage box.

Wispy false eyelashes.
Cut to different lengths, All The Wispy Ladies Premium 3D Faux Mink Lashes create a dramatic, intense effect. Lasting up to ten uses, the high quality synthetic fibres look full and thick for a classic, wispy finish.
product_name: All The Wispy Ladies Premium 3D Faux Mink Lashes

product_description:
Beautyblender Blendercleanser Solid (28g) will keep your beautyblender sponges in perfect condition.
Hygiene is a must when it comes to keeping your skin fresh and healthy. Oil and dirt from your face will stay on your applicators if you donÉt take a moment to properly clean them.
Blendercleanser Solid is the travel-friendly alternative to the best-selling liquid Blendercleanser; providing the same cleansing results and soothing Lavender fragrance for your beautyblender Sponge this solid cleanser is the perfect hygienic companion.
Blendercleanser Solid is free of dyes and skin irritants and has a soothing soy-based formula which breaks down rapidly, making it earth-friendly and fun to use. Soy has the added benefit of being one of natureÉs finest moisturisers too, so by all means, clean up with class and do it often.
Blendercleanser Solid leaves your makeup sponges hygienic and in perfect condition for long-wearing, continuous usage.

A makeup blending sponge.
With a pointed tip and rounded sides, My Flawless Blender Digit offers precise application and blending to all areas of the face. Designed to be worn on the finger, the sponge is easier to manoeuvre and more natural to use.

Paul & Joe Face Pressed Face Powder Case is a stylish storage case for the Pressed Face Powder Refill (sold separately).
The perfect addition for any elegant makeup bag, Pressed Face Powder Refill is the perfect storage solution for your Paul & Joe Pressed Face Powder. With a signature decadent champagne gold design with a delicate chrysanthemum motif, Pressed Face Powder Refill allows you to create your own unique compact and is a handbag essential.

A pair of feathered false lashes.
Creating dramatic length and volume, Mink Crystal Lashes Nixie sit naturally and clearly on the lash line for a seamless appearance. With grouped separate sections, create extreme definition and long-lasting curl.

A compact makeup bag for your smaller beauty essentials.
Keep your makeup organised with this transparent cosmetics bag from Morphe Brushes. Conveniently designed so you can see all your products at a glance, and easy to wipe clean, the ZMB8 Taker Set Bag is loved by professionals and makeup lovers alike. Two side zipper pockets allow for easy storage of smaller items.
Measurements: 11''L x 3''W x 6''H
_Please note, bag is supplied empty - makeup products are for illustrative purposes only and are not included. _

A statement cosmetic bag.
Black and white, I Like My Rose Chilled Small Canvas Makeup Bag keeps all your makeup essentials safe and secure. Fitting perfectly into your handbag, the lightweight material and zip fastening makes it easy to carry.
product_name: I Like My Rose Chilled Small Canvas Makeup Bag

product_description:
An innovative tool crafted to make the challenge of producing even wings so much simpler.
Warmed in the palm of your hand, Liner.Designer Pro Eye Liner Application Tool adheres to the skin for a secure, hands-free template for the perfect winged liner. Housed in a mirrored compact with an additional sucker pad, the kit is the ideal companion for eye liner application no matter where you are. Simply pressed onto the skin, the edge of the tool can be traced to ensure a flawless wing every time.
product_name: Liner.Designer Pro Eye Liner Application Tool

product_description:
A synthetic pair of intense false eyelashes.
Designed for small eyes, My Mannequin Lashes add intense volume and definition. On a clear, flexible band, seamlessly apply to the lash line to complete a dramatic smoky eye look.

Violet Voss Eye Do Premium 3D Faux Mink Lashes provide a full, luscious effect for the lashes sumptuously.
Complete your glamorous lash look with these sensational crisscross lashes. Beautifully hand crafted using Faux Mink, Eye Do Premium 3D Faux Mink Lashes are easy to use. Sure to be a Beauty Bay best-seller, Eye Do Premium 3D Faux Mink Lashes are the perfect finishing touch to your eye makeup and are ideal for making a beauty statement.
Get the lashes you have always dreamt of with Eye Do Premium 3D Faux Mink Lashes.
product_name: Eye Do Premium 3D Faux Mink Lashes

product_description:
Ardell Lashgrip is a lash adhesive which has been specially formulated for use with Ardell Lashes.
Boasting an advanced formula which dries quickly and is virtually invisible, Lashgrip is also waterproof and holds strip lashes securely in place. Lashgrip is available in clear or dark to suit all lash styles and has a Latex based formula which offers temporary hold and is easy to remove without damaging the natural lashes.

Anastasia Beverly Hills Brow Scissors are an essential beauty tool for trimming unwanted facial hair.
Crafted exclusively in Italy, Brow Scissors are manufactured with the highest quality Stainless Steel blades for grooming perfection and precision. Beautifully designed for optimal control, Brow Scissors are the perfect size and shape for trimming brows.

Beautyblender Beauty.Blusher is a high-definition sponge applicator for the seamless distribution of blusher.
Ideal for blusher application, Beauty.Blusher's edgeless shape delivers fast, fool proof results and effectively eliminates visible lines and streaks. The non-Latex sponge has an open cell structure which when wet with water fills the air opening to prevent the sponge from absorbing the products you're wearing meaning after each use you won't need to use as much makeup.
Inspired by the best-selling Original beautyblender, Beauty.Blusher has been exclusively designed to caress the apples of the cheeks and offers exceptional precision and performance.
Ideal for cream and powder-based blusher, Beauty.Blusher ensures a streak-free finish with minimal makeup waste, meaning everybody will want to know the secret to your flawless airbrushed look.

Morphe Brushes HH Square Snakeskin Case is a magnetic storage solution for your makeup tools and beauty essentials.
Boasting a stylish faux snakeskin design, HH Square Snakeskin Case has a box like design which will look gorgeous on any dressing table and delivers spacious storage for your makeup brushes and favourite cosmetics.

Anna Sui Hand Mirror is an antique inspired beauty mirror.
A must have for any dresser or vanity table, Anna Sui Hand Mirror is a small hand mirror which imitates a full-length antique mirror. Beautifully stylish and expertly designed with Anna SuiÉs signature detailing, Anna Sui Hand Mirror is the perfect way to add a touch of elegance to your beauty regime.

Velour Lashes Velour Lash Stick is a high performance lash glue in an easy to use pen applicator.
This patent pending lash glue has a twist pen dispenser which reduces wastage whilst the pointed tip offers precise application with less mess. Velour Lash Stick has an innovative formula which can be applied to the lashes straight away, no need to wait for the glue to go tacky like traditional lash glue, just apply and go!
Specially formulated for use with Mink lashes, Velour Lash Stick is available in various shades to match any makeup look and is easy to remove without damaging your Velour Lashes or natural lashes.

A super sleek magnetic mini palette that stores three of your favourite shades.
Developed to offer a compact storage solution to a few of your best-loved hues, the Mini Magnetic Palette is an ideal handbag must-have. Complete with a sturdy magnetic base the durable compact is sure to keep your shadows safe from harm.

A whitening tooth polish.
For additional oral care, Bamboo Charcoal Tooth Whitening Polish removes surface stains. Recommended for regular daily use, the low abrasion toothpaste neutralises discolouration without damaging enamel for strong, healthy and clean teeth.

Violet Voss Striptease Premium 3D Faux Mink Lashes accentuate the eyes flawlessly, creating fuller, fluffier lashes effortlessly.
Exquisitely handcrafted with Faux Mink, Striptease Premium 3D Faux Mink Lashes has a semi dramatic design with a pattern that gradually gets longer towards the centre giving you the glamorous movie star effect.
Suitable for all occasions from rock concerts and cocktails to a casual day look, Striptease Premium 3D Faux Mink Lashes will suit all eye shapes and are adored by beauty professionals and amateurs alike. Offering a lightweight, natural look, Violet Voss lashes can be reused up to 10 times and are sure to be a Beauty Bay best-seller.
Let your eyes do the talking with Striptease Premium 3D Faux Mink Lashes.

Z Palette Square Metal Stickers are custom-made square metal stickers - because not all makeup comes in round pans!
Z Palette thought about everything in the Z Palette creation process; these innovative stickers stick to the bottom of pans from original packaging, just peel the paper from the back and the sticker instantly creates a strong magnetic bond so your pan is ready to be put it its space saving place.
The flat surface is ideal for the writing the name of your shades so you always know where to find your favourite shade and are ideal for de-potted make-up.

A circular makeup applicator.
With non-absorbent properties, Stardust SiliSponge applies and blends liquid and cream products without any waste. Round and compact, reach in and around the corners of the face with this hygienic, easy-clean and glittered sponge.

A fun and glamourous palette ideal for holding up to nine standard pans.
A flirtatious patterned palette like the character herself, Betty Boop Bubbles Small Magnetic Palette is the perfect way to customise a travel sized collection. Complete with a magnetised base, the sturdy casing is the best way to protect your favourite hues.
product_name: Betty Boop Bubbles Small Magnetic Palette

product_description: A set of cruelty-free, vegan-friendly false lashes that add doll-like definition to the eyes. Sexy And Eye Know It Premium Lashes are made of synthetic bristles that remain durable for the duration of wear.
product_name: Sexy And Eye Know It Premium Lashes

product_description:
Como Shambhala Invigorate Blended Essential Oil is a powerful blend of uplifting scents to enhance your mood and uplift the emotions.
An elevating blend of Eucalyptus and Peppermint is complemented by the softness of Lavender and Geranium to rediscover mental clarity and physical energy. Como Shambhala’s signature blend, Invigorate Blended Essential Oil can be used for vaporisation or as a room fragrance to uplift the mood and create an elevating ambience.
Free from Parabens, Sulphates and Silicones, Invigorate Blended Essential Oil has a 100% natural formulation and leaves you feeling uplifted and energised.

A palm-sized, brush cleansing companion ideal for on-the-go cleaning.
Especially created to give an effortless cleansing solution for your much-loved makeup brushes, the Practk Palmat is an essential tool for any beauty lover. The unique silicone pad is designed with four raised textures that work together to remove dirt and oils from the bristles without altering their plush texture. The innovative pad is also fitted with a strap for hand-held cleaning, as well as suction cups to secure it firmly in the basin allowing you full cleansing control without any hindrance.

An all in one brush belt with adjustable strap.
With eighteen various sized compartments the Studio Pro Beauty Belt is ideal for transporting your favourite beauty tools. The easy clean brush belt is complete with an adjustable waist strap making it easy to use for any beauty lover.

Morphe Brushes ZMB1 Lugger Set Bag is a professional storage and transportation solution for your makeup collection.
Designed for convenience and portability without compromising on storage space, ZMB1 Lugger Set Bag features a variety of internal and external pockets and is a Beauty Bay must have for professional makeup artists or for those beauty junkies who like to take their makeup everywhere.

A marble printed makeup bag.
Convenient and compact, You Look Marbleous Cosmetics Bag is available in two colours to store and carry your must have makeup items. With a rose gold zip fastening, securely keep brushes, makeup and skincare in this stylish faux leather case.

The longest length lash Unicorn Lashes have created to date!
Designed to give you an effortlessly whimsical, yet dramatic feel no matter what eye look you're rocking, the 3D Silk Lashes Everlong are not for the faint hearted. The ultra-long, synthetic silk fibres sit seamlessly along the lash line for a unique, eye-catching finish.

Morphe Brushes A1 Jumbo Professional Apron is a must have beauty tool for makeup artists.
Make sure your beauty essentials are always to hand with this stylish black apron. Designed with makeup artists in mind, A1 Jumbo Professional Apron includes pockets for all your makeup brushes, tools and cosmetics and has an adjustable strap which fits around most waists; the long apron deign also helps to keep your clothing clean.

Ardell Fashion Lashes 117 are natural full looking curved false lashes which add enviable volume to your natural lashes.
Reusable and easy-to-apply, Fashion Lashes 117 can be used for up to three weeks and are the perfect style for enhancing your natural lash flutter. Fashion Lashes 117 are made from 100% sterilised human hair and are ideal for any occasion.

Velour Lashes Lash In The City are the perfect false lashes for a dark smoky eye.
Beautifully handcrafted with 100% authentic Mink Hair, Lash In The City are easy to apply and can be reused up to 25 times. Offering a lightweight, natural look, Velour Lashes are cruelty free with Mink Hair ethically sourced from free range zoos, the luxurious Mink Hair is recycled during the shedding seasons and then sterilised to ensure it is completely safe for use.
Lash In The City are suitable for all eye shapes and are the perfect choice for girls who just wanna have fun! Designed with extra fur on the cotton band to provide a dramatic and full look, this best-selling lash style also adds a winked look to the corner of the eyes.

Whitening and strengthening, a toothpaste that will deliver a Hollywood smile in an instant.
Formulated to not only whiten the surface of the tooth but to restore the natural strength and enamel, Instant Whitening Toothpaste keeps teeth looking and feeling at the top their game. Both safe and effective, the clinically proven paste whitens teeth up to eight shades lighter for a healthy, eye catching smile you can achieve from home.

Violet Voss Wisp It Real Good Premium Lashes is a Natural lash enhancer that guarantees to beautifully frame the eyes.
Designed to create a subtle yet effective look, Wisp It Real Good Premium Lashes are exquisitely hand crafted using Human Hair and are perfect for accentuating your lashes with a touch of glamour and exquisite style. Easy to use, these magical lash enhancers deliver effortless application and are the perfect lash style for the party season.
Get ready to flutter those lashes with Wisp It Real Good Premium Lashes.
product_name: Wisp It Real Good Premium Lashes

product_description:
The answer to all your brush cleaning needs, literally in your hands.
Developed for the ultimate comfort and upmost convenience, the Sigma Spa 2x Brush Cleaning Glove is home to eight raised textures for the intense deep cleansing of all your favourite eye and face tools. The unique design allows for an easy transition between the two sides and varying textures for a very simple hand held, stress free cleaning experience.

The perfect makeup bag for any cat lover.
Created to carry all of your favourite beauty must-haves, the Oh K! Kitty Bag features a spacious inner pocket and sturdy wrist strap for safe, yet incredibly adorable travel solution. Complete with sticking up ears and a super-cute cat face design, this black cosmetic bag works just as well as a clutch or cosmetics carry case.
Nails Inc Professional Nail File is perfect for keeping your nails in beautiful shape.

A set of printed face charts.
Printed on high quality, textured paper, MY FACE by My Kit Co. Face Charts x 15 allows for makeup practicing and planning. Designed to hold product where you want it, create looks for both your personal and professional needs.
product_name: MY FACE by My Kit Co. Face Charts x 15

product_description:
Cover FX Click Stick Baton is the perfect storage solution for your makeup must-haves.
Designed to contain two of the Correct Click, Cover Click or Enhance Click, Click Stick Baton is a dual-ended vessel that protects the chosen products from damage whilst allowing you to look fabulously flawless on-the-go, thanks to its travel-friendly size.
This portable tool ensures that you have full creative control, making it a certified must-have for any cosmetic junkie's collection.
Take perfection anywhere you go with Click Stick Baton, just Pick, Click and Go!

A precision makeup applicator.
For detailed application, Midnight Point SiliSponge perfectly applies cream and liquid products under the eyes and around the nose. Made with non-absorbent materials, apply 100% of product with no wastage and an easy clean surface.

An empty, magnetic palette.
Designed to store Ofra's individual godets, Pop Up Palette stores up to 48 grams of product. With individual pans available in 2,4 and 10 grams, customise your palette for the ultimate collection of eyeshadows, blushers and bronzers. Perfect for use on the go, prop up the base of the palette for a compact and convenient product stand.

Whispie lashes created to achieve a naturally lengthened and fuller finish.
Created with mink hair, the Bare Naked false lashes offer a lightweight, volumised finish with style. The individual fibres are attached to an invisible band for a completely natural look, whilst the spaced out, cluster design of the hairs mimic the layout of natural lashes for a perfected wide eyed look.

Unleash the drama queen in you with this pair of ultra-black, voluminous false lashes.
Sometimes all you need is add a little drama to your look for it to truly pop: 3D Mink Lashes Cosmic Pegasus do exactly that! Crafted with high quality mink hair and a durable black band, these falsies can be relied upon time and time again for an amped up finish.

Velour Lashes Strike A Pose is an indulgent pair of natural false lashes with glamorous length and thickness.
Are you ready for the spotlight? Strike A Pose are one of Velour Lashes most dramatic styles and are the perfect false lashes for making bold beauty statements. With a Cotton band and a beautifully handcrafted design, Strike A Pose are made with 100% authentic Mink Hair which has been ethically sourced from free range zoos and recycled during the shedding seasons, then sterilised to ensure it is completely safe for use.
Easy to apply, Strike A Pose can be reused up to 25 times and are suitable for all eye shapes. Designed with an abundance of Mink Fur with extra length and thickness, Strike A Pose guarantees you will be the centre of attention for all the right reasons.

The perfect lashes for adding an intensely fluttery finish to your look.
With a gradually elongated length from the inner to outer corners, the Sydney 3D Mink Lashes create a mesmerising feminine finish. The silk-like mink fibres boast a true black hue along with a flawless fullness giving you the ideal lashes for daytime glam with added drama.

An exfoliating body sponge.
For daily use, Charcoal Body Exfoliating Sponge naturally smooths and firms skin. Gentle enough for all ages and skin types, scrub the body to improve texture and reveal a radiant, luminous complexion.

Created with 100% organic unbleached muslin cotton, Pai's 5 Organic Muslin Cloths are the ideal way to achieve a deeply cleansed complexion. Super soft and non-abrasive, the cloths offer a gentle exfoliating action that leaves the skin feeling clean and refreshed.

Created to commemorate the fifteenth anniversary of the iconic beautyblender sponge, a duo of powder pink minis.
Developed to make contouring and highlighting with both powders and creams easier than ever, the Bubble Micro.Mini Duo is a must-have for creating a flawless base. Hand cut to a unique teardrop shape to ensure precision colour application, the miniature suede-like sponges are perfect for sculpting out even the smallest of areas for a seamless finish.

A makeup brush holder.
Perfect for travelling, RC2 Brush Tubby Case is a black, faux leather cylinder. With two press stud fastenings, use the other half as a protective lid or to separate dirty and clean brushes at home.

Paul & Joe Vintage Beauty Mirror is an elegant compact mirror which is perfect for touch ups on the go.
Large enough to allow you to see your whole face, Vintage Beauty Mirror has a slim line design which fits perfectly in any handbag. The innovative fold back lid allows you to stand the mirror upright for effortless makeup application.
The sophisticated design has pleat detailing and a chrysanthemum motif which makes this gorgeous mirror a collectable, standout makeup essential.

Full, fluffy and voluminous false lashes that give the perfect finishing touch to any sultry smoky eye.
Crafted to add intense drama and depth, the 3D Silk Lashes Rebel Smoke are ideal for any party-ready eye look. Crafted with the finest wisps of synthetic silk in a gradient of length from the inner to outer corner each attached along a durable black band, these lashes just scream undeniable glamour.

Thick, jet black lashes.
Made for a night out, ML112 Premium Lashes create dramatic volume. Transforming any look, the synthetic lashes are cruelty free and high quality for long, uninterrupted wear that's lightweight and comfortable.

A latex-free makeup sponge for the seamless application of cream, powder or liquid-based products. Easy to clean and effortless to control, Wonder Sponge glides smoothly across the skin, imparting the desired amount of product without creating streaks, patches or unevenness.

Tweezerman Pushy & Nail Cleaner is an innovative 2 in 1 manicure tool which neatens cuticles and cleans nails.
Expertly crafted using the finest Stainless Steel, Pushy & Nail Cleaner combines Tweezerman's famous Pushy® cuticle pusher with a convenient nail cleaner. Super-thin edges are buffed smooth to prevent scratching while the textured body provides a perfectly secure grip.
A must-have classic for professional quality manicures and pedicures, Pushy & Nail Cleaner can also be used on acrylic nails. Nails are left superbly clean whilst cuticles appear healthy and perfectly groomed.

The ultimate brush cleaning system.
Enhancing the cleaning and drying process, Sigma Brush Care System Complete is a fast and hygienic alternative. With textured sides, swirl shampooed brushes over the pads for a deeper clean that removes oil and bacteria before drying and reshaping up to 18 brushes.

A faux leather brush holder.
With individual brush pockets, Glamher Booth Brush Roll holds up to 18 brushes. A pale pink colour, the case is soft to touch and easy to clean with a magnetic snap fastening for maximum convenience.

A multi-length set of faux mink lashes to add a sultry finish to the lash-line.
Designed by reality star Kim Zolciak Biermann, the Believe by Kim Zolciak Biermann 3D Mink Band-Less Lashes are perfect for delivering an effortlessly glamourous look. The unique lashes boast a comfortable, lightweight and clear band along with ultra-black fibres varying in length to create a multi-dimensional, voluptuous finish.
product_name: Believe by Kim Zolciak Biermann 3D Mink Band-Less Lashes

product_description:
Individual, disposable mascara wands.
An essential for every professional makeup kit, Myscara Wands x 20, offers hygienic application for each client. In a pack of twenty, each wand can be used once to apply mascara or comb brows.

Lashtite Black works to provide a strong grip on individual lashes for weeks' worth of adhesion in one application. The black tone of the glue creates depth to the lash-line which is easy to blend with your favourite eye liner for a dramatic finish.

The ultimate, professional makeup carrier.
With separate pockets, My Backstage Buddy has compartments for palettes, makeup and even tissues. With a handy strap and clear sides, carry them all comfortably whilst seeing what's inside. Perfect for on set, stylishly and conveniently take everything you need.

A set of false lashes that add volume and depth.
Designed to impart enviable volume, the Mykonos 3D Mink Lashes are ideal for those whose want to take their eye look to the next level. The unique design of interlacing 'V' shaped clusters creates seamlessly blended results with a flirty, full finish.

A classic eyelash curler.
In stylish rose gold, Rose Gold Classic Eyelash Curler volumises and curls lashes. With a rounded, silicone pad, each lash is captured and curled for intense, long-lasting definition.

A multi-layered set of real mink lashes to add noticeable dimension to the lash-line.
Developed to impart wispie length that gradually builds towards the outer corner, the Doha 3D Mink Lashes are ideal for creating a wide-eye finish. With a layer clustered mink hairs for length over top of hair in criss-cross formation for volume these lashes truly deliver an undeniably versatile look.

Morphe Brushes Morphe Sharpener ensures that your eye and lip lining will always be precise and flawless due to the pin-point tip it provides.
Featuring two barrels for small and thick pencil barrels, Morphe Sharpener has a patented two-blade design which ensures the pencil tip is never over or under sharpened. Perfect for sharpening and reshaping lip and eye pencils, Morphe Sharpener can be used with a multitude of cosmetic pencils, making it a certified must-have for any makeup fanatic.
Get to the point with Morphe Sharpener.

Kevyn Aucoin Face Forward Book is a stunning picture book packed with amazing celebrity transformations which show how makeup can give anyone a variety of different 'faces'.
A national best-seller, Face Forward Book is a comprehensive selection of images, illustrations and step-by-step guides and features celebrities such as Gwyneth Paltrow, Susan Sarandon, Martha Stewart and Madonna transformed into other iconic celebrities and historic figures such as James Dean, Twiggy, Cher and Sophia Loren using just a combination of makeup and Kevyn's pure talent.
Proving beauty is not just for Hollywood, Face Forward Book also shows everyday men and women such as sales associates and mothers transformed through the art of makeup. For every look step by step instructions are provided so you can recreate the looks at home.

iWhite Instant Professional Teeth Whitening Kit 2 is a high performance at home teeth whitening kit which whitens the teeth by up to 8 shades, strengthens the teeth structure and restores enamel.
Powered by the new and unique Triple Teeth Whitening Technology, Instant Professional Teeth Whitening Kit 2 is a one-step system which is easy to use and will actively remove stains from the teeth with immediate effect after the first application.
Clinically proven safe and instantly effective, Instant Professional Teeth Whitening Kit 2 features 10 thin and flexible trays to ensure comfortable fit and maximum performance without having to clean or boil messy mouth pieces or mess with fussy syringes or brushes. This one size fits all teeth whitening kit only takes 20 minutes a day and can be used for 5 consecutive days for astonishing results or once in a while for whitening maintenance.
The whitening gel of InstantProfessional Teeth Whitening Kit 2 combines the knowledge and technology of iWhite Instant -Film-Crystallized Calcium technology - with additional benefits due to the innovative Triple Teeth Whitening Technology. Patented Phthalimido Peroxy Caproic Acid (PAP) targets the unnatural double bounds which cause dental discolorations and dissolves the stains present on the enamel in a gentle and effective way; by doing this, the tooth surface is whitened and stains are removed.
The second functional aspect of the technology is the Calciofluorocomplex. Fluoride particles will be adsorbed onto the surface of a tooth and speed up the growth of new surface. The complex will also release additional Calcium Ions, this will increase the Calcium levels in the saliva and inhibit the loss of apatite in the enamel. The Calciofluorocomplex will hereby remineralise damaged enamel and strengthen the teeth structure. This will lead to a natural whitening effect.
Finally the innovative MOHA Complex is composed of small, snow white Hydroxyapatite Microcrystals which are released on the enamel and is the key natural building block of teeth. By releasing these hydroxyl-apatite crystals this ingredient will restore and rebuild the enamel and enable the teeth the regain their natural white colour.

Aesthetically pleasing and completely travel-friendly, Easy Finish Facial Hair Remover features two easy-grip handles and an adjustable coil spring that gently, painlessly and effectively removes any unwanted strands from the complexion, resulting in a smooth, supple effect.
Promising to eradicate all traces of unwelcome facial hair, Easy Finish Facial Hair Remover certifies itself as a true cosmetic necessity and is suitable for all hair and skin types, even the most sensitive.
Suitable for use on the cheeks, jaw line and upper lip, Easy Finish Facial Hair Remover causes no irritation to the skin whist remaining efficient, making it a must-have for any beauty junkie.
Say goodbye to facial hair with Easy Finish Facial Hair Remover from the experts at Tweezerman.

Disposable makeup sponges.

A latex-free beauty sponge.

A caring hair towel created to reduce the damage caused when drying.

Produced with a 100% microfiber material in a hooded design, the wrap helps to absorb excess moisture whilst preventing frizz leaving hair looking and feeling healthier.

product_description: Designed with a convenient self-adhesive band Press On Lashes Wispies Black achieve fluttery, whimsical lashes which are applied with ease. Be the envy of everyone at the party with these flirty falsies.
Designed with super wispie mink hairs, the Lush Luxury Mink Lashes are ideal for adding a volumised touch of glamour to your look. The super lightweight lashes sit seamlessly along the lash-line for stay all day comfortable wear.

Music and makeup: what could be better? Designed with a unique spin on MC Hammer's famous 'Stop Hammer Time' lyric, Stop! Glamour Time Slogan Cosmetic Bag is the perfect mix between the two worlds. product_description:
Ardell Natural Lashes Beauties are natural looking false lashes which add gorgeous length and definition.
Complete with an invisible band that connects the hair strands to form a strip, Natural Lashes Beauties are knotted and feathered by hand for perfect uniformity and a natural look. Natural Lashes Beauties are made of premium quality 100% human hair which provides just the right length and volume and are perfect for accentuating your natural lash flutter.

A magnetic palette for cream products.
With 16 compartments, My Magnetic Cream Palette stores a selection of your favourite products. Save space in your kit and travel bag by de-potting small amounts of products in to the plastic tray provided and magnetically popping it in to the palette.

A super-soft powder puff.
Created to apply face powder evenly to the complexion, the Anna Sui Puff is the perfect partner for your pressed and loose finishing powders. Complete with a fabric band for complete control, this classic powder applicator sets foundation on the go for a fresh, matte finish.

A silicone-based makeup applicator.
Crafted from a super-smooth silicone, the Perfect Weapon Applicator guarantees a flawless, full coverage finish with zero product wastage. Specifically designed to apply and blend makeup just like your favourite sponges and brushes, but without absorbing any of your makeup, this innovative applicator is a real game changer.  With no need to dampen, this silicone sponge can be used instantly with powder, cream and liquid makeup, for a seamless finish with minimal effort.

Velour Lashes #WINGing are beautifully flared Mink false lashes.
Looking for a doll like flutter but with a little bit extra flare? #WINGing are the falsies for you! With a doll like effect, #WINGing will give you length and dramatic impact with a long short graduated pattern and more Mink Fur concentrated at the longer sections and towards the outer corner of the eyes.
Reusable for up to 25 times, #WINGing are suitable for all eye shapes, are easy to apply and have been beautifully handcrafted from 100% genuine Mink Hair ethically sourced from free range zoos.

Ardell Natural Lashes Demi Whispies are premium false lashes which create an elegant and voluminous lash look.
Complete with an invisible band that connects the hair strands to form a strip, Natural Lashes Demi Whispies are knotted and feathered by hand for perfect uniformity and a natural look. Natural Lashes Demi Whispies Lashes are made of superior quality 100% human hair and provide just the right length for a glamorous flutter.

Add voluminous definition and enviable depth to any look with these lightweight lashes.
Crafted with fibres of super fine synthetic silk, the 3D Silk Lashes Unicorn Flutter are a must-have addition to any lash-lover's collection. The unique clustered, 'v' shaped design allows you to add just the right amount of depth and volume along the lash-line for a mysterious finish to your eye looks.

St.Tropez Applicator Mitt is a dual sided mitt perfect for applying St.Tropez Self Tan Mousses and Lotions.
Featuring a water resistant barrier to ensure your fingers remain unstained this high-performance Applicator Mitt gives even and smooth results.
Self-tan is applied flawlessly without streaks or patchiness.

Delicate and elegant, this set of falsies are perfect for day to day wear
Ultra-feminine and fluttery, the Mink Lashes Luna Fleur are staple additions to any collection. Produced with a lightweight durable band and a criss-cross arrangement of mink hair, these lashes feel and look effortlessly glamourous.

A convenient hand held brush mat for hands on deep cleaning of your favourite tools.
Created with seven uniquely developed textures, the Sigma Spa Express Brush Cleaning Glove allows you to achieve varying levels of cleanliness depending on the combination used for both face and eye brushes. Complete with a convenient universally fitting thumb and wrist strap, the cleaning matt is going to become your much loved cleaning companion for a vigorous cleanse.

A synthetic pair of dramatic false eyelashes.
Delicately fanned, My Downtown Disco Lashes add dimension and volume. Building towards the outer corners, the flicked lashes create enviable curl that can be worn alone or to accessorise bold makeup looks.

A medium, bright and bold customisable palette.
With sharp geometric patterns, Geo Neon Pop Collection Medium Magnetic Palette stylishly stores individual makeup pans. Compact and travel sized, de-pot and carry powders, highlighters and lipsticks to match your mood.
product_name: Geo Neon Pop Collection Medium Magnetic Palette

product_description:
This Works Deep Sleep Pillow Spray is a calming room spray designed to help induce a deep, restful sleep.
Infused with Essential Oils of Lavender, Vetivert and Wild Chamomile, Deep Sleep Pillow Spray helps you to wind down after a hectic day by soothing the body and mind. This best-selling, natural sleep aid fragrances the room whilst calming your nerves and will become your must-have sleep solution.
The best beauty secret there is, Deep Sleep Pillow Spray has a highly effective formula which encourages a natural deep sleep so that you wake looking and feeling fantastic.

Tweezerman No Slip Skincare Tool masterfully removes unwanted blackheads and whiteheads from the complexion, leaving the skin fresh and clear.
Featuring an anti-slip grip on the handle, No Slip Skincare Tool efficiently yet gently removes unsightly and non-desirable blemishes and imperfections from the skin, resulting in a clearer, healthier finish that will leave everybody in awe, especially yourself!
Combining a thin, angular end to eradicate matured breakouts and a flat side to press out annoying blackheads, this beauty necessity works tirelessly to cleanse the skin of its flaws without damaging the surrounding skin.
Remain impeccable with No Slip Skincare Tool.

The chore of brush cleaning has finally been given a long awaited make over.
Sigma Spa Express Brush Cleaning Mat sits snugly into most sinks boasting 32x smaller size than the original Sigma Brush Cleaning Mat for an ultra-convenient cleaning experience. Designed with seven different textured surfaces in order to deep clean varying types of brushes, the mat is sure to become the only brush cleaning companion you rely on.

A large empty palette.
Allowing maximum creative freedom, Large Empty Magnetic Palette creates the ultimate customised palette. Holding up to 15 individual pans, magnetically attach separate and de-potted products to store and carry your favourite shadows, highlighters and blushers.

A bold set of lashes created to add depth and dimension to your eye looks.
Designed by Britanny Bear to complement her super-sultry eye looks, the Brittany Bear 3D Mink Lashes are an eye-catching essential. The uber glamourous lashes boast a number of 'v' shaped clusters along a true black band allowing you to achieve voluminous depth and enviable length.

A set of false lashes that accentuate the eyes and provide a natural flutter with ease. Simple and mess-free to apply, Eye Donut Care Limited Edition Lashes are lightweight and gentle to the skin. This pair is perfect for adding subtle volume with a natural finish.
product_name: Eye Donut Care Limited Edition Lashes

product_description: A pair of volumising false lashes that accentuate the natural strands whilst adding definition. Combining the texture of real mink fur with synthetic technology, Unicorn Flare Premium Lashes remains lightweight and durable for the duration of wear.

A pack of five blending puffs.
With an innovative finger-sock design, My Velour Puffs offer even easier base make-up application. For smooth, even coverage use your finger to apply and blend around the larger and smaller areas of the face.

A deep cleansing brush cleaner.
With both disinfecting and conditioning actions, the Studio Pro Makeup Brush Cleaner is ideal for use with all your favourite tools. The lightweight formula works quickly to remove makeup residue deep within the bristles for a new brush feel with every use.

Definitely the lash of choice for those who want to take your eye look to the next level.
One of the fullest lashes Lilly Lashes has created, the Carmel 3D Mink Lashes are a party look must-have. Designed with length that gradually increases from the inner to outer corner, the ultra-black lashes are perfect for adding a sultry flourish to any look.

Violet Voss Wispy My Name Premium Faux Mink Lashes naturally enhance the existing lashes for a dramatic statement whilst maintaining a subtle finish.
Wispy My Name Premium Faux Mink Lashes are the perfect beauty accessory for adding a touch of after dark drama or daytime chicness to your makeup look. Featuring a fine crisscross effect, Wispy My Name Premium Faux Mink Lashes are the ideal choice for adding a touch of natural looking volume and length to your lashes and are easy to apply.
Flutter those bad boys with Wispy My Name Premium Faux Mink Lashes from the beauty experts at Violet Voss.
product_name: Wispy My Name Premium Faux Mink Lashes

product_description:
iWhite Instant Whitening Mouthwash is a daily use mouthwash which actively helps to whiten the teeth.
Boasting a triple action formula enriched with Blue Covarine, Instant Whitening Mouthwash immediately gives the appearance of whiter teeth with just one use. Designed to remove and prevent plaque formation, Instant Whitening Mouthwash promotes a brighter, whiter smile.
Clinically proven, safe and effective, Instant Whitening Mouthwash dissolves tooth discolouration without damaging the teeth or gums whilst the Fluoride infused formula helps to strengthen the teeth.
Suitable for twice daily use, Instant Whitening Mouthwash offers active stain removal and whitening benefits and leaves the teeth up to 8 shades whiter.

A deep cleansing brush cleaner.
Formulated to keep your best-loved tools in optimum condition, the SigMagic Brushampoo is a brush maintenance must-have. This innovative formula utilises three natural ingredients which work in synergy to remove dirt and grime allowing your brushes to work to their maximum potential.

Anna Sui Oil Control Paper Refill is a set of purple blotting papers to keep shine and oil at bay.
Effectively absorbing excess oil and dirt to reveal fresh and flawless skin, Oil Control Paper Refill is a refill for the Anna Sui Oil Control Paper and Case (sold separately) and is a discreet way to keep the complexion looking matte and chic.
Perfect for use before or after makeup application, this must-have beauty tool lifts dirt, oil and impurities from the skin to keep your complexion looking marvellously matte in even the most humid weather and helps to beat the heat and maintain a smooth, shine-free complexion all day long.

A large eyelash curler.
With protective silicone pads, Super Curl Eyelash Curler safely and gently curls the eyelashes. Providing instant and long-lasting results, the extra-large surface curls every inch and can be warmed for bigger, better results.

A selection of short individual lash clusters.
Designed to be the must-have for all your lash needs no matter what the occasion calls for, ML Flare Short Premium Lashes are sure to be your go to. The cleverly compiled short fibred clusters add small bursts of volume and definition, offering you the opportunity to use as many or as few as you need in order to achieve your lash goals.

The perfect false lashes to add enviable length to your lashes whilst keeping it looking au naturel.
Adding eye opening lash length with a soft and wispie design, the Mink Lashes Aurora Queen will definitely become your go-to falsies for daily wear. Created with whimsically long mink hairs and a durable black band, these lashes can be relied upon for your daily dose of eye-catching drama.

Paul & Joe Cat Cosmetic Pouch is a cute and fashionable storage solution for all your makeup essentials.
Combining great looks and fantastic functionality, Cat Cosmetic Pouch s a vanity model of the ever popular Paul & Joe cosmetic pouch and has room for even more items and additional carrying convenience.
The top section has slim compartments for storing brushes and pencils, along with transparent pockets. In the vanity section, there is a small pocket on the side where you can store your Paul & Joe cosmetics in an easy and practical way. The zip fastening ensures all your makeup is kept safe and secure during transit.
The playful cat motif is selected from a Paul & Joe Fashion original print and is a favourite of designer Sophie Albou. Just carrying this chic pouch is so exciting you’ll instinctively want to show it off.

Paul & Joe Brush Holder is the ideal storage solution for all your makeup brushes and tools.
Store your makeup brushes and accessories with style and sophistication with this delightful Brush Holder. Expertly designed with Paul & Joe’s signature chrysanthemum motif, Brush Holder has a retro modern look that will add a touch of joy and happiness to your dressing table.

A criss-cross style set of falsies harbouring volume and length in all the right places.
Created for those of you who struggle with hooded eyes, the 3D Silk Lashes Buttercup are the perfect falsies for created a wide-eyed finish. The super-fine, synthetic silk fibres have been expertly placed in a unique criss-cross pattern that varies in length to provide the perfect amount of stylish volume and enviable length.

Flat, funnily shaped brushes be gone with tower that ensures dry, perfectly shaped brushes every time.
Sigma Dry'N Shape Tower Face And Eyes makes the step after cleaning your brushes that much more enjoyable. By simply clipping your wet brushes into the specially created compartments with the bristles placed in the shaping bands, the drying apparatus keeps your tools looking the same as the day you're brought them.
product_name: Dry'N Shape Tower Face And Eyes

product_description: A latex-free makeup sponge for the seamless application of cream, powder or liquid-based products. Easy to clean and effortless to control, Wonder Sponge glides smoothly across the skin, imparting the desired amount of product without creating streaks, patches or unevenness.

A large, bright and bold customisable palette.

product_description:
Eyeko Black Magic Lash Curler is a black velvet eyelash curler to ensure the lashes are always beautifully curled.
The ergonomic handles on this expertly crafted tool are finished with soft-to-touch velvet which provides the perfect amount of pressure, control and precision to lift your lashes ready for mascara application. The enhanced design features silicone based grips to ensure a comfortable experience with the optimum curl each and every time.
Set to be a Beauty Bay best-seller, Black Magic Lash Curler lifts the lashes for a wide open eye look.

Offering length and curl, these falsies leave any eye look with a statement finish.
Developed to offer that added oomph to your favourite looks, the Mink Lashes Aquarelle are ideal for both day and night wear. Lovingly crafted with ultra-long, softly curled mink hairs and a thin, durable black band these lashes are effortlessly eye-catching.

product_description:
A pack of 50 mini cotton buds.
The ultimate corrector tool, My Mini 'On Point' Buds remove all traces of smudged makeup. With a micro-fine tip, neatly wipe away stray flicks and smudged lipstick to create a neat and tidy edge with ultimate precision.

Volumising false lashes.

An effective makeup applicator.
Blending cream and liquid products over larger areas of the face, Midnight Chic SiliSponge creates an even and seamless base. Made with non-absorbent materials, apply 100% of product with no wastage and an easy clean surface.

A synthetic pair of feathered eyelashes.
Multi-dimensional, My Featherette Lashes combine fibres of different lengths for a choppy, full flutter. Winged towards the outer corner, the layered lashes sit on a clear, flexible band for a comfortable, seamless and feminine finish.

A statement cosmetic bag.
Black and white, Flawless AF Small Canvas Makeup Bag keeps all your makeup essentials safe and secure. Fitting perfectly into your handbag, the lightweight material and zip fastening makes it easy to carry.

product_description:
Velour Lashes Velour Lash Stick is a high performance lash glue in an easy to use pen applicator.
This patent pending lash glue has a twist pen dispenser which reduces wastage whilst the pointed tip offers precise application with less mess. Velour Lash Stick has an innovative formula which can be applied to the lashes straight away, no need to wait for the glue to go tacky like traditional lash glue, just apply and go!
Specially formulated for use with Mink lashes, Velour Lash Stick is available in various shades to match any makeup look and is easy to remove without damaging your Velour Lashes or natural lashes.

An extra-large customisable palette.
With a textured, woodgrain detail, Golden Grain Extra Large Magnetic Palette holds and displays your choice of makeup. With a golden, glittered foil, stylishly keep and carry individual pans of eyeshadow, blusher and highlighter.
